# Mock Skill Gamma

## Overview

Third mock skill for testing complex workflows with multiple skill invocations.

## When to Use

- Testing 3+ skill workflows
- Testing loop iterations with different skills
- Testing branching with skill alternatives

## Behavior

When invoked:
1. Announce "Mock Skill Gamma activated"
2. Complete immediately

## Test Output

```
âœ“ mock-skill-gamma executed successfully
```
